name: Running in the 90's
description:
This is student team project game we made for our course in the final year of our studies. 

It's inspired by Initial D , a Japanese street racing manga series.  The style is very retro and 90's like. You play as a girl that runs on the streets and needs to jump over or slide under different obstacles. Don't be surprise if you see some UFO's along the way!

There is a little catch in the gameplay, you will run into some tapes. Try to collect the and see what happens next!

Good luck!
